GAL 2.16 aþþan witandans þatei ni wairþiþ garaihts manna us waurstwam witodis, alja þairh galaubein Iesuis Xristaus, jah weis in Xristau Iesua galaubidedum, ei garaihtai wairþaima us galaubeinai Xristaus Iesuis jah ni us waurstwam witodis;
unte ni wairþiþ garaihts us waurstwam witodis ainhun leike.
...GAL 2.17 sokjandans ei garaihtai domjaindau in Xristau, bigitanai sijum jassilbans frawaurhtai, þannu Xristus frawaurhtais andbahts?
nissijai.
GAL 2.18 unte jabai þatei gatar, þata aftra timrja, missataujandan mik silban ustaiknja.
GAL 2.19 unte ik þairh witoþ witoda gaswalt, ei guda libau.
GAL 2.20 Xristau miþushramiþs warþ, iþ liba nu ni þanaseiþs ik, iþ libaiþ in mis Xristus.
aþþan þatei nu liba in leika, in galaubeinai liba sunus gudis, þis frijondins mik jah atgibandins sik silban faur mik.
GAL 2.21 ni faurqiþa anstai gudis;
unte jabai þairh witoþ garaihtei, aiþþau jah Xristus sware gaswalt.
GAL 3.1 O unfrodans Galateis!
ƕas izwis afhugida sunjai ni ufhausjan? izwizei faura augam Iesus Xristus faurameliþs was, in izwis ushramiþs?
GAL 3.2 þatain wiljau witan fram izwis,
uzu waurstwam witodis ahman nemuþ þau uzu gahauseinai galaubeinais?
GAL 3.3 swa unfroþans sijuþ?
anastodjandans ahmin nu leika ustiuhiþ?
GAL 3.4 swa filu gawunnuþ sware?
aþþan jabai sware!
GAL 3.5 saei nu andstaldiþ izwis ahmin jah waurkeiþ mahtins in izwis, uzu waurstwam witodis þau uzu gahauseinai galaubeinais?
GAL 3.6 swaswe jah Abraham galaubida guda...
GAL 3.27 swa managai auk swe in Xristau daupidai wesuþ, Xristau gahamodai sijuþ.
GAL 3.28 nist Judaius nih Kreks,
nist skalks nih freis,
nist gumakund nih qinakund;
unte allai jus ain sijuþ in Xristau Iesu.
GAL 3.29 aþþan þande jus Xristaus, þannu Abrahamis fraiw sijuþ jabbi gahaitam arbjans.
GAL 4.1 Aþþan qiþa:
swalaud melis swe arbinumja niuklahs ist, ni und waiht iusiza ist skalka, frauja allaize wisands;
GAL 4.2 akei uf raginjam ist jah fauragaggam und garehsn attins.
GAL 4.3 swa jah weis, þan wesum barniskai, uf stabim þis fairƕaus wesum skalkinondans.
GAL 4.4 iþ biþe qam usfulleins melis, insandida guþ sunu seinana, waurþanana us qinon, waurþanana uf witoda, GAL 4.5 ei þans uf witoda usbauhtedi, ei suniwe sibja andnimaima.
GAL 4.6 aþþan þatei sijuþ jus sunjus gudis, insandida guþ ahman sunaus seinis in hairtona izwara hropjandan:
abba, fadar!
GAL 4.7 swaei ni þanaseiþs is skalks, ak sunus;
iþ þande sunus, jah arbja gudis þairh Xristu.
GAL 4.8 akei þan sweþauh ni kunnandans guþ, þaim þoei wistai ni sind guda skalkinodeduþ;
GAL 4.9 iþ nu sai, ufkunnandans guþ, maiz-uþ-þan gakunnaidai fram guda, ƕaiwa gawandideduþ izwis aftra du þaim unmahteigam jah halkam stabim, þaimei aftra iupana skalkinon wileiþ?
GAL 4.10 dagam witaiþ jah menoþum jah melam jah aþnam.
GAL 4.11 og izwis, ibai sware arbaididedjau in izwis.
GAL 4.12 aþþan wairþaiþ swe ik, unte jah ik swe jus,
broþrjus, bidja izwis.
ni waiht mis gaskoþuþ.
GAL 4.13 wituþ þatei þairh siukein leikis aiwaggelida izwis þata frumo, GAL 4.14 jah fraistubnjai ana leika meinamma ni frakunþeduþ, ni andspiwuþ, ak swe aggelu gudis andnemuþ mik, swe Xristu Iesu.
GAL 4.15 ƕileika was nu audagei izwara?
weitwodja auk izwis þatei jabai mahteig wesi, augona izwara usgrabandans atgebeiþ mis.
GAL 4.16 iþ nu swe fijands izwis warþ, sunja gateihands izwis?
GAL 4.17 aljanond izwis ni waila, ak usletan izwis wileina, ei im aljanoþ.
GAL 4.18 aþþan goþ ist aljanon in godamma sinteino, janni þatainei in þammei ik sijau andwairþs at izwis.
GAL 4.19 barnilona meina þanzei aftra fita, unte gabairhtjaidau Xristus in izwis.
